library.description: String identifier for the library defined in this map file, e.g. 'ENDF/B-VIII.0'.
library.name: library

description: Checksum for the map file, computed by string-concatenating all checksums inside
the file (in the order they appear) and computing the checksum of the resulting string.
checksum.name: checksum

algorithm.description: Algorithm used to compute the checksum.
algorithm.name: algorithm

import.description: Imports another map file using a path (relative or absolute).
import.name: import

protare.description: Adds one evaluation to the map file, using relative or absolute path.
protare.name: protare

TNSL.description: Adds a thermal neutron scattering law evaluation to the map file, using relative or absolute paths.
TNSL.name: TNSL

map.description: A map file organizes multiple files into a library. Individual files are called `protares': PROjectile + TARget + Evaluation.
map.name: map

path.description: Path to another map file imported by this file.
path.name: path

checksum.description: Checksum of the imported map file, identical to the \attr{checksum} attribute in the top node of that file.
checksum.name: checksum

algorithm.description: Algorithm used to compute the checksum. Defaults to the \attr{algorithm} of the parent \element{map} file.
algorithm.name: algorithm

import.description: Imports contents of another map file into this map file. Care must be taken to avoid circular imports.
import.name: import

evaluation.description: Evaluation label, usually equal to the library name e.g. `ENDF/B-8.0`.
evaluation.name: evaluation

path.description: Path (absolute or relative) to the reactionSuite associated with this protare.
path.name: path

interaction.description: Type of interaction. Options are: `nuclear', `atomic' and `TNSL'.
interaction.name: interaction

checksum.description: Checksum for the protare file located at the given \attr{path}.
checksum.name: checksum

algorithm.description: Algorithm used to compute the checksum. Defaults to the \attr{algorithm} of the parent \element{map} file.
algorithm.name: algorithm

protare.description: Adds a single reactionSuite (or `ProTarE') to the map file.
protare.name: protare

evaluation.description: Evaluation label, usually equal to the library name e.g. `ENDF/B-8.0`.
evaluation.name: evaluation

path.description: Path (absolute or relative) to the reactionSuite associated with this protare.
path.name: path

interaction.description: Type of interaction. Only option in this case is `TNSL'.
interaction.name: interaction

checksum.description: Checksum for the TNSL file located at the given \attr{path}.
checksum.name: checksum

algorithm.description: Algorithm used to compute the checksum. Defaults to the \attr{algorithm} of the parent \element{map} file.
algorithm.name: algorithm

standardTarget.description: Particle id of the protare to use for reactions / incident energies outside the range of this TNSL target.
standardTarget.name: standardTarget

standardEvaluation.description: Evaluation label for the protare to use for reactions / incident energies outside the range of this TNSL target.
standardEvaluation.name: standardEvaluation

TNSL.description: A thermal neutron scattering law (TNSL) target to add to the map file. Requires also listing the `standard' protare to be used outside the limits of the TNSL data.
TNSL.name: TNSL
